This chunk explains how to add texture mapping to a soft body patch in Panda3D using Bullet physics, including generating texture coordinates and loading a texture file.

python

tex = loader.loadTexture('models/panda.jpg')
visNP.setTexture(tex)
BulletHelper.makeTexcoordsForPatch(geom, resx, resy)
